column5: Unreal!!!!!  Puts the size of fish in the ocean and on the reef in perspective for sure.
Man that's intense! That fish was huge! Just imagine the one that ripped it apart like that!
Musta been a great white. The great barrier reef is infested with them. That was really cool! Thanks for posting that!
Holy That head is at least twice as big as the one posted in our board room!
I am never swimming in the ocean again!!!  Cool video, thanks.  Joey
It was a jumbo perch that did it   Super post
Great video! You'll find me on great barrier if I win the lottery.
WOW It looks that it was just a snack, to what ????????  :dunno:
Wow...wouldn't have believed it if I didn't see it.  Unbelieveable!!!  Thanks fo sharing the link.
From the title of this thread I thought I was about to see an episode of "Going Fishing"
I think a world record geogrian bay muskie must have attacked it. That was a pretty cool vid. That scarry, im really stayin away from the ocean.
WOW...THATS AMAZING,THE SIZE OF THE SHARK THAT BIT HIM IN HALF,I WOULD LOVE TO CATCH ONE OF THOSE A FISH OF A LIFETIME
lol BBR haha. but seriously that fish was huge!!
wow that was cool thanks for sharing!  Cheers!
